artist: Artist: Orazio Borgianni; Artist: After school of Raphael (Raffaello Sanzio)
description: Jesus standing left of center, wearing a loincloth, with John the Baptist right of center, pouring water on Jesus' head; two figures at left, one kneeling figure at right; sketchy angels at right edge; several other sketchy figures at left; tiny face in black ink, URC
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

ULC, in brown ink: [mano Del Borgiano vien da Raffaello]
markings: on back, stamped in black: [T.H.] (?variant of Lugt 2433, Thomas Thane) or [J. H.]; [T.Th.] or [T.K.] or [J.K.]
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, May 29, 1975, part of no. 206, or Â£110, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Baptism of Christ
